scripts.build: vite build && mv public/themes/doomtrooperdb/assets/*.ico public/themes/doomtrooperdb/assets/*.json public/themes/doomtrooperdb/assets/*.png public/themes/doomtrooperdb/assets/*.xml public/themes/doomtrooperdb/assets/images/favicons && mv public/themes/doomtrooperdb/assets/images/favicons/_manifest.json public/themes/doomtrooperdb/assets/manifest.json
